strapiJob.title: Production Associate
strapiJob.description:
• Perform production tasks according to standard operating procedures and manufacturing guidelines.
  • Complete quality records for manufactured products.
  • Guide other Associates in their assigned duties when needed.
  • Identify and report unsafe practices to Manager immediately.
  • Attend job trainings related to production and machinery for professional growth.
  • Complete daily assigned tasks to meet production volume and schedule.
  • Ensure that work environment is maintained clean, safe and organized.
  • Identify and resolve problems concerning equipment and materials.
  • Ensure that the manufactured product meets customer specifications.
  • Maintain documentations for production related activities for reference purposes.
  • Be able to lift 30 lbs over head.
  • Strong passion for efficiency and cleanliness.
